sithuwili akuru kale mudalithumo........me mama.....gama ra madinna.........ee kaleuththama numbaa wahansewadina kala gama maddenkanu palle pa randawahisa namamin wigasakinegathimi lensuwa dathata...........tharaha awasara mudalithumo..........ewwo danithda ewwaye rangaonna balantako wunu deapi denna mehema mehemamuna balan inna lesatachithra andala ellala mun........mudalithumo tharaha awasaraurahise ma thiyala andalalensuwath.....ammapa munara hankada sudda thamayi,bole eda ooka ande,ee madiwata kande nuwara,ellalalu porasiddiye,okkotama wadiyath mage,malu natanne ammapa,nayi mallath kare daman,rata purama awidina ara,anga pulawakatama nathi,nuhugune wage athi gatissi,kollantayi ballantayi,hathara athe rattuntayi,hamadamath balaganta,ellala undage bolokke,ane ammapa wechchi deyak,sansare......sansare!!!dilshara wirasinha soyuriya kawadath wage age athi lipiyak eeyeth pala karala thibuna.

dambaulla rohale korona wairasaya shariragatha wi prathikara labamin sita panagiya yachakayaku soya sodisi meheyumak ada (01) dina aarambha kara athi bawa dambaulla polisiya pawasanawa.dambaulla nagaraye awidimin sigamane yedena yuwalak giya masa (28) dina dambaulla rohalata hadisi asanipa thathwayak nisa prathikara labaganimata pamina thibenawa ee anuwa owunta sidukarana lada pi.si.aar. parikshanayakadi korona wairasaya asadanaya wi athi bawatayi thahawuru wiaththe.rohale wishesha prathikara eekakaye newasikawa prathikara labamin siti pirimi pudgalaya siya birida dama rohalen panagos athibawa waidya adhikariwaraya polisiyata danum di thibenawa.ee anuwa polisiya me wanawita pala giya pudgalaya soya sodisi meheyumak aarambha kara thibenawa.sappan chandran namin rohalata athulath wi athi mohuge sthira padinchiyada methek sanatha kara ganimata nohaki wi athi bawayi polisi sandahan kale.me sambandhayen dambaulla polisiya wadidura parikshana pawathwanu labanawa.
